title: problems with backticks
body:
**Describe the bug**
When typing a backtick (`) for me it does not trigger an inline code, not does typing triple-backticks trigger a code block.
It's especially relevant, that my keyboard requires me to type shift+^ for the backtick, and then followed by the space to "finalize" the backtick.
It works in the web app. Just not in this electron app. So it could be related.
